name: Christopher Lindsey
text: Jim is knowledgeable and really funny.  He is focused on the work. My hydraulics come here to be repaired. I wouldn't even consider going any other place.

resp.text: Thank you Chris!

name: Krash Hamilton
text: Great people that are dedicated to perfection.

name: Blake Powers
text: Price  gouging at its best!!!  They had one guy working 5 hours of wo $1900!  On top of that they were supposed to meet us at 8:00 AM on Saturday morning and showed up at 11. It cost us a whole day of work.  Save yourself by not making this mistake !  The job should’ve been $400.  I’m taking this to the better business bureau.

name: Eddie Kiser
text: Great people to have working for you. Sam was an excellent help after hours got us back going quick. No one eles will get my business while working in this area.

resp.text: Thank you.  I will tell Sam of your kind words!

name: Bill Yancy
text: Just excellent service. I left my backhoe's leaking arm cylinder here and JimPam had it ready for me in 2 days, and at a better price for new seals than I've EVER gotten. It works like brand new now, Jim's experience speaks for itself

resp.text: Thank you! I'm glad we were able to get you up and running quickly!

name: Chuck Linderman
text:
They do jobs nobody else can. The Hydraulic manifold on my Russian Belarus 250AS was in need of an overhaul. Every where I took it said trash it, buy another or wouldn't even consider attempting to rebuild it.
Jim was able to do the job for a fair price and saved me a lot of time and money. Check them out !!

resp.text: Thanks Chuck! It was a pleasure meeting you, and thank you for the comment!

name: Robyn Z
text: Excellent, friendly, professional, and very clean shop. And fast services. I won't go anywhere else for my hydraulic services. Thanks Jim your awesome!

resp.text: Wow!  Thanks so much!

name: franklin mitchell
text: Check with Jim before you buy the rebuilt kit from dealer. A friend told me about  Jimpam. Now ill tell all in need of repair where to go. Excellent  experience

resp.text: Thank you! We are usually able to buy parts, seals, etc for less than what our customers could buy the item for.  We pass that savings on to our customers.  Thanks for your review!

name: Mike Smith
text: Totally ruined a hydralic lift unit.Still to this day unable to use! Should have been told but i guess they were more into money than customer.

name: Mike S
text: Best tech in the southeast. If no one else can do it, Jim can!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to say!  We appreciate your business!

name: Halle Miller
text: This place has very good service. Be sure to see the very nice lady at the front office.

name: Jackson moore
text: I had my truck at River City Diesel for 4 days. When the truck was dropped off they were instructed to check the electronic control module.  I called every day for 4 days getting the same answer when I asked how they were coming with fixing it. Everyday I got the same answer “he’s working on it “. Finally get the mechanic on the phone and he tells me he hasn’t found anything wrong. So I ask about the ecm and he says oh that’s not your problem. I said did you check it and he has his hillbilly attitude and says no didn’t I tell you that’s not your problem. Needless to say he was told to get my truck together and I went to get it. I won’t be using this place again and I hope you don’t either.

resp.text: Mr. Moore, we are sorry you feel this way but would like to add that when you first called and asked about sending your unit, it was almost two weeks after we were expecting that it  was actually brought here.  We had several other projects that had come in during that time period.  Also please let everyone know that this is not the only place of business that you have done this to, you had just got the unit back from another shop.  You don't have to have the needed repairs done at our shop, but no need in making people look bad when they done things correctly.

name: Johnny Peeks
text: Had a wheel seal leaking. Showed up at 3:30 pm.. they pulled me right in had the parts in stock had me back on the road and had to replace a bearing all for under $350..

name: John Marshall
text: Great place of business  !!

name: Eric Roop
text: One of my semi-trucks was broke down in the area due to an EGR Valve issue.  When I called River City Diesel, the staff was very nice and willing to work my unit in for repairs.  I had and EGR Valve next day aired to them and requested them to go ahead and begin work on the EGR VALVE and NOTHING ELSE.  Next day, I receive a phone call from the foreman stating that my truck was ready and that after installing the EGR Valve they found that the DPF was in zone four.  They took it upon themselves to remove the DPF and PRESSURE WASH it out with water and DAWN DISH SOAP!   At this point, I didn't know what to say or think.  My reply was, "Why did I not receive a phone call stating that my DPF was in zone 4 and authorization to remove it and PRESSURE WASH it out with DAWN DISH SOAP!?"  The foreman replied, "Well Sir, it had to be done and didn't cost any extra, it was all part of the job."  Again, I was speechless.  What kind of repair shop would remove a DPF and pressure wash it out without getting approval from the customer?  I ask him if he at least installed new DPF gaskets, and his response was, "No, I didn't have any but they will be O.K. because they are made of reusable material."  Again, I was speechless.  For those of you who know about cleaning and installing DPF filters, this was a BIG MISTAKE and could possibly damage the SCR Catalyst, put the truck at risk for fire and/or DOT shutdown.  After discussing my discontent with the foreman I paid the bill and deadheaded my truck back to Knoxville.  Luckily, he made it back with no issues.  I had my mechanics inspect the EGR Valve repair that they did, and found that a clamp was left loose and rubbed a hole in the rubber hose.  We then, removed the DPF filter and found that it had been pitted out (from PRESSURE WASHING) and the filter was flaking.  So far, I've had to replace the DPF, clean the DOC and replace 3 sensors.  I hope no other damage is done to this unit.

name: Tidewater Tidewater
text: Great guy ...had no problem matching up my fittings and building a hydraulic hose seems to have a good stock for Logging equipment hydraulics

name: George Patterson
text: Very professional!  Very knowledgeable!  Highly recommend using them for all hydraulic repairs!!

name: Donna Thompson
text:
Excellent Company and professional staff!!  Absolutely recommend and endorse this company.
They do great work!!!

name: Dalton Huggins
text: Worked here best hydraulic mechanics I've ever met

name: things I build (Things i build)
text: Good. Fast service.

name: Anna Bryant
text: Great folks. Courteous, helpful nd stuff gets done in a timely manner!

name: jerry morgan
text: Great owner operated small business helps the little guy a lot!

name: Dana Eberly
text: What awesome service and awesome people!

name: frank potter
text: Great at helping someone that does know much about hydraulics.

name: George York
text: I've used there services for several years for my equipment, never had to take anything back, prompt service at reasonable rates from a small business who knows their customers. Always  knowledgeable, informative and very helpful.

name: Jared Winton
text: If you were to look up the definition of customer service it would simply read Total Hose! The people that work there will go out of their way to make sure you leave not only with more knowledge about what you are repairing/replacing but also the correct parts to repair/replace the problem. They completely made an OEM installed product better with their knowledge and skill. On top of all that it was super affordable. Highly recommend Total Hose for any of your air/hydraulic/water lines or maintenance.

name: Jessica Reece
text: The guys in here are always helpful. They can always find what I need. So appreciative of the fact that they'll build whatever hose we need while I wait. They are a lifesaver.

name: Mark Burch
text: Very helpful place. They patiently took the time to help me figure out what I needed for my application and explain things to me. I'll be returning for sure.

name: David Cady
text: Knowledgeable, fast, and very skilled at building/routing hydraulic lines

name: Patrick
text: My go to place for hydraulic hoses and hose fittings.  Always quick to custom manufacture what I need when necessary.

name: Jeremy Nichols
text: Excellent service

name: Timothy Gulley
text: Great place to come for all your hose needs come on by and let us fix you up

name: Poppi3579
text: Great place, Great Service.  Thanks Tim

name: Ray Blackwell
text: Great personal staff and the Yard Man went above and beyond the call of duty to help me to cover the exhaust system from the weather. I've been doing business with COWIN for many years. All locations are in the great state of alabama. Service and sales good place for your needs on equipment.

name: Schubert Enterprises, LLC
text: Cowin Equipment is a business that involves working with great people, and easy to work with. We really have enjoyed working with this company and Daniel Lawrence.

name: Rebecca Moore
text: The service manager is AWESOME!! If you need to rent heavy equipment this is the place!!

name: Local 360
text: Outstanding selection of product. Staff is knowledgeable and friendly.

name: Jonathan Patterson
text: Understaffed. Friendly and helpful just not enough of them

name: rafa abastta
text: Excellent customer service... We asked for diagrams and got them within the hour... we were able to order that day.... for Overnight.  Chris Ward was Super Fast and very helpful. He helped us get what we needed.

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Love it :)

name: Greg Parker
text: Owner of store has a it’s her way or no way…..I tried to simply explain what someone told me to her and she said “are you afraid to spend a little money” and she also said “are you going to diagnose every single thing your self” but she also told me to bring it the next day to her, not the same day and then has a attitude if I diagnose my own stuff, very rude owner.

name: EMMA AUTOMOTIVE LLC
text: Hands down the best hydraulic machine shop around. Top quality isn't  cheap, but dependable! Great people to work with!

name: Reggie Whiddon
text: Let me be clear this is your place. For any hydraulic problem you have cylinders seals they do it all. The nicest people you ever deal with

name: Taylor Towing
text: The worst experience with a shop by far and as a repeat customer I can assure you I will not be back poor service and literally wanted to charge for doing nothing

name: Steven Burke
text: By far the most entitled people I've ever dealt with less than six months ago spent over 1900 dollars repairing a truck and tried to be a repeat customer so I brought them 2 cylinders to repair they wanted to charge 2700 to fix them which is outrageous then when I came to pick them up they wanted to charge $125 to release them back to me after they had done nothing

name: Geoy
text: What grate places to do hydraulic repair i have a car hauler trailer and when I got there every was nice and very helpful thank u guy

name: Meda Mccray
text: Wonderful place!

name: Thomas Weiss
text: Had my old 70s cylinders that were bad and there are no replacement parts sold anymore. They manufactured and repaired the parts I needed.  Great prices. Good people,will always go back..  Thanks guys!!!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: William Rutherford
text: I believe the owner and one of the helpers helped us out.  They took the time, care and helped us with our punctured hose on our machine.  He was very thorough and gentle with our business equipment. When we tried it out at home it was still leaking. He told us to bring it back if it did-another fitting came loose when the new hose was put on.  They fixed it free of charge.  We really appreciated their honesty and help. Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Merideth Williamson
text:
Over passed 15 years My husband has been working with Snead Hydro. Cranes, bucket trucks, log trucks, loafers, plow trucks ...
Never had any issue. Not even ones. Good job. Always highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Williamson its always a pleasure helping out with all your hydraulic equipment needs! We appreciate your business and the five stars it means a lot! Hope all is well, feel free to reach out to us anytime we will be more that happy to help!

name: Patricia James
text: We were in need of a monoblock valve for my Mahindra tractor, and was referred here from my tractor dealer. They jumped right on it and new exactly what to use to get my project done. Excellent prices as well. Proud to have been able to support a local company too. They gained a lifetime customer. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mrs. James we appreciate the opportunity to fix your hydraulic valve! Feel free to contact us if you have any other hydraulic repair needs! Its our goal to help our customers with any hydraulic issues they might have in a time and cost friendly manner!

name: Robby Walker
text: Absolutely a pleasure to deal with. Had everything in stock. Highly recommended

resp.text: Thank you

name: Alan Perry
text: Awesome real time custom hydraulic hoses. Seriously, they took the time for it! Will always come back. Thanks!!

resp.text: You're so welcome thank you for you business we appreciate it! Feel free to bring all you hydraulic work to us! It is our goal to take our time and fix things the right way!

name: Marlene Hodges
text:
I sent in a set of track adjusters, they rebuilt them. I got them back, there was a problem requiring warranty work, performed the work.
Failed after very little use.
After a couple conversations with them I received a call from a gentleman whose name escapes me. Not only did they fix it again after the warranty period was officially over. They upgraded the failure point.
Mistakes happen, it's the follow up that counts

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Ronald Lynch
text: Brought my 8k forklift piston in for a leaking issue...presto it was repaired and back to us at a great price ! Friendly staff ! -- Ronald

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Lynch we appreciate your business and we are happy we could help! Never hesitate to call us for all your hydraulic repair needs! We thank you for the five stars! Hope you have a blessed day!

name: Rachel Iorg
text: Just moved to the area and brought in some equipment to have hydrologic hoses redone. Charged triple what I have paid in the past for hoses. One of the o-rings broke that they put in with the hoses. I went back to get a new O-ring and they charged $20 for the o-ring. Save your money and go somewhere else.

resp.text: Snead Hydraulics appreciates our customers and strive to perform our services at the highest of standards.  I apologize that you were not satisfied with our services.  I know you have come to our facility multiple times and each time we tried our best to supply you with the best services.  We try to supply a higher grade of O Ring which in turn cost more than a cheaper one would.  Unfortunately we can not just give our products away.  We are a small business and we do our best to service our customers with the highest of satisfaction.  Feel free to give us a call at 205-466-3105 we would be glad to discuss this matter further with you.

name: isaac Iorg
text: Total rip off. Lied about everything then handed me a bill 3x more than quoted. Also charged me $20 for a regular o-ring.

resp.text: Snead Hydraulics appreciates our customers and strive to perform our services at the highest of standards.  I apologize that you were not satisfied with our services.  I know you have come to our facility multiple times and each time we tried our best to supply you with the best services.  We try to supply a higher grade of O Ring which in turn cost more than a cheaper one would.  Unfortunately we can not just give our products away.  We are a small business and we do our best to service our customers with the highest of satisfaction.  Feel free to give us a call at 205-466-3105 we would be glad to discuss this matter further with you.

name: Roy Sullivan
text: Excellent service

resp.text: Thank you for you business! Looking forward to helping you with all your hydraulic needs in the future!

name: Manuel Valentino
text:
(Translated by Google) My engles not good but 5 stars of business worked fast and help me good.
The business gets 5 stars because they were able to help me quickly even though I don't speak English well.

(Original)
My engles not good but 5 stars de business worked fast and help me good.
El negocio obtiene 5 estrellas porque pudieron ayudarme rápidamente a pesar de que no hablo bien inglés.

name: Larry Miller
text: Great equipment rental and super service dept.

name: Jerry Ross
text: Good

text: Great folk, great service,  quality products

name: Daniel Clark
text: very helpful staff and plenty of options

name: Joseph Beck
text:
I have had two of my woodshop power tools repaired by Alabama Jack. Both times quality work at a fair price and in a good time period.

If you have power tools or such in need of repair or maintenance I highly recommend Alabama Jack.

name: Tony Patterson
text:
I drove from Atmore, Al. down to Lift Parts Service.  The gentleman that helped me with 4 cylinder repair kits could not have been nicer.
He was very knowledgeable in exactly what I needed to repair my cylinders.  The prices on what I bought were very reasonable and appreciated.  Thank you for your great service
in helping me. Tony Patterson

name: Richard Bollard
text: Had jack built a year and a half ago. After paying $450 to have it rebuilt I got it out to use it for only the second time and it was leakin . Lift products told me that the seal had went out from sitting up and recharged me again.

name: James Sweeney
text: Do not ever take anything to these crooks.They will tell you one price and charge you another. They are rude disrespectful and liars. The only reason I give it a star is to be able to warn others to stay away.

name: Mark
text:
I was having problems with my 2014 Dodge 6.7 diesel.  Stopped at City Diesel while traveling from Kentucky to Florida.  They are normally very busy but they got me in the shop and back on the road in just a few hours.  Highly recommend this company if you want top notch work.  My turbo actuator is working perfectly now since it was replaced. The truck pulls great and the exhaust brake works better than ever.
Big thanks to the crew at City Diesel!!

name: James Scarbrough
text: Quality work done in a timely manner.

name: John Blankenship
text: Awesome company to do business with..highly recommend

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback! Let us know if we can do anything to help you.

name: John Bell II
text:
Outstanding work done on my 6.0, Bennett Clark, called and explained what work was done. He is very knowledgeable and explained my engine and it's repair in understandable terms.
I have been doing business with City Diesel since 1999, they know Diesel engines! They are very honest and reliable , great mechanical business. I can not say enough about them being trustworthy and reputable, I highly recommend City Diesel.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback.  We do appreciate hearing back from our customers.  I'll let Bennett know you were pleased.

name: Jane Smith
text: Were supposed to do an entire motor rebuild and instead replaced very few parts new resulting in an engine failure .. terrible costumer service.. just a plain rip off

resp.text: Jane Smith, is that the name you did business with us under?  I do not have any record of any transaction and we keep great records.  On the off chance that this is a real review under a pseudonym we keep excellent records and have a good warranty policy and any engine repair we did would be covered by warranty.   I would be happy to sit down with you and go over what was replaced and what warranty options you have.  Of course this would require this to be a legitimate review that has actually done business with us. Having only 3 reviews all of them one star and hundreds if not thousands of miles apart seems suspicious.  In the future I would recommend a more convincing fake name and maybe use a different profile for reviews in New York  and Alabama when you are leaving fictitious reviews.

name: Nicfin36
text: Jay did an awesome job fabricating a metal hydraulic line for my tractor. Top notch work. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We always enjoy feedback good or bad but it's especially nice to hear when we do a good job

name: Jerrid Seiler
text: Best custom hoses to be had. Quality of materials and service is actually 6 star worthy. I have never waited more than  10 minutes for anything.

name: Jed Hadley
text: Great business! Very nice and knowledgeable anything to do with diesel trucks and equipment.

name: wade harris
text: Excellent service and great people

name: Randy Aldridge
text: Been dealing with them over 2o yrs
